Package org.apache.taverna.activities.spreadsheet

Contains the activity classes required to include spreadsheet files within a DataFlow.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SpreadsheetReader
    Interface for reading a spreadsheet from an input stream.
    SpreadsheetRowProcessor
    Interface for processing a row of data from a ExcelSpreadsheetReader.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CSVSpreadsheetReader
    Reads CSV files.
    ExcelSpreadsheetReader
    Reads Excel '97 (.xls) or Excel '07 (.xlsx) spreadsheet files.
    ODFSpreadsheetReader
    Reads Open Document Format (ODF) spreadsheet files.
    Range
    A range of integer values.
    SpreadsheetImportActivity
    An net.sf.taverna.t2.workflowmodel.processor.activity.Activity that reads spreadsheet files.
    SpreadsheetImportActivityFactory
    An ActivityFactory for creating SpreadsheetImportActivity.
    SpreadsheetImportConfiguration
    Configuration for the SpreadsheetImport activity.
    SpreadsheetImportConfiguration.Mapping  
    SpreadsheetImportHealthChecker
    Health checker for SpreadsheetImport activities.
    SpreadsheetUtils
    Utility functions for handling spreadsheet column labels and indexes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SpreadsheetEmptyCellPolicy
    Enumeration of the policies for handling empty/missing cells in a spreadsheet.
    SpreadsheetOutputFormat
    Enumeration of the formats for output of spreadsheet cell values.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SpreadsheetReadException
    Exception thrown when a spreadsheet cannot be read due to an IO error or when the file format is not supported.

Package org.apache.taverna.activities.spreadsheet Description

Contains the activity classes required to include spreadsheet files within a DataFlow.
